To get your hand on the source for the *software*, *firmware*, *hardware*, or *mechanical* aspects of the devices:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/openmovement/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk Browse the source code]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/openmovement/source/checkout Checkout the source code]

The source code includes:

  * Software

  * Firmware
    * Flux Library
    * AX3 Device Firmware
  * Hardware
    * AX3 PCB and Schematic
  * Mechanical
    * AX3 Mechanical
